EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge 2016 - Invitation to Assessment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your staffing representative on {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}. Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for applying to work on the 2016 NCS programmes. We are delighted to invite you to one of our group assessments - congratulations!
Booking onto an assessment
To book onto one of our group assessment you'll need to login to the staffing website and head to the 'Booking Assessments' section, which should now be available to you.
In this section you can:
See a list of assessment dates 'Register' onto or 'Decline' dates Review details of your chosen event Request alternative assessment dates*
*Please note that we cannot always guarantee an alternative assessment date - we strongly recommend that you make every effort to be available for those listed.
Reasonable adjustments at assessment
If you have a disability or additional needs and require any reasonable adjustment at assessment on our part, please get in touch with the Inclusion Staffing team on inclusion.ss@the-challenge.org. Any information you disclose to Inclusion Staffing will be treated confidentially, and will not be used in any decision making in regards to your application.
Any questions?
If you have any difficulty booking onto an assessment, or if you would like to discuss the assessment requirements please contact your local staffing team. You can also find information on our asssessment FAQs.
We look forward to meeting you!
Best wishes,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}
